value.description_zh: 当前进度（必须介于最小值/最大值之间）

min.description: Minimum value defining 'no progress' (must be lower than 'max')
min.description_zh: 定义 'no progress' 的最小值（必须小于 'max'）

max.description: Maximum value defining 100% progress made (must be higher than 'min')
max.description_zh: 定义 100% 进度的最大值（必须高于 'min'）

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

center-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
center-color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette
center-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

track-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

font-size.description: Size of text in CSS units, including unit name. Suggestion: use 'em' units to sync with component size
font-size.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位表示的文本大小，包括单位名称。建议：使用 'em' 单位与组件尺寸同步

thickness.description: Thickness of progress arc as a ratio (0.0 < x < 1.0) of component size
thickness.description_zh: 进程弧的厚度与组件尺寸的比率 （0.0 < x < 1.0）

angle.description: Angle to rotate progress arc by

indeterminate.description: Put component into 'indeterminate' state; Ignores 'value' prop
indeterminate.description_zh: 将组件置于 'indeterminate' 状态;忽略 'value' 属性

show-value.description: Enables the default slot and uses it (if available), otherwise it displays the 'value' prop as text; Make sure the text has enough space to be displayed inside the component
show-value.description_zh: 启用默认插槽并使用它（如果可用），否则它将 'value' 属性显示为文本;确保文本有足够的空间在组件内部显示

reverse.description: Reverses the direction of progress; Only for determined state
reverse.description_zh: 反转进步的方向;仅适用于确定状态

size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称或标准大小名称 （xs|sm|md|lg|xl）

slots.name: default
slots.description: Used for component content only if 'show-value' prop is set; Make sure the content has enough space to be displayed inside the component
slots.description_zh: 仅当设置了 'show-value' prop 时，才用于组件内容;确保内容有足够的空间在组件内显示
